review: Well, I bought this following the ad that Fire Stick can travel with you overseas.  Following Amazon's instructions, I switched the device to Germany during our vacation and guess what, - it only shows content in Germany in German!  Perhaps Amazon should throw in Rosetta Stone with their Stick and warn customers that when they claim "take your TV anywhere with you", they are overselling it just a little bit.  Also, customer support on Fire Stick is abysmal, no one within that department knows what to do.  I had to call 3 times to even get my Fire Stick to work in Germany, only to find out that none of the content is actually in English.  Disappointment.
